pharmacy ka itihas manav sabhyata ke vikas ke sath gehraai se juda hua hai  jahan prachin kaal mein log aushadhiyon ke gunon ko samajhne aur unka upyog karne lage the  prachin misr  mesopotamia aur cheen mein aushadhiya paudhon ka upyog kiya jata tha  aur wahan ke chikitsak aushadhiyon ko tayar karne ke liye vibhinn takneekon ka vikas kar rahe the  greek aur roman sabhyataon mein bhi pharmacy ka mahatva badha  jahan hippocrates aur galen jaise chikitsakon ne aushadhiyon ke adhyayan mein mahatvapurn yogdan diya  madhyakaal mein  arab chikitsakon ne pharmacy ke kshetra mein kai nai khojen ki  aur aushadhiyon ke nirmaan ki prakriya ko vyavasthit kiya  aadhunik yug mein  aushadhiyon ke vaigyanik adhyayan aur anusandhan ne pharmacy ko ek peshewar kshetra mein badal diya  jahan pharmacists na keval aushadhiyon ka vitran karte hain  balki rogiyaon ko swasthya sambandhi salah bhi dete hain  aaj  pharmacy ka kshetra tezi se vikasit ho raha hai  jismein nai takneekon aur anusandhanon ke madhyam se aushadhiyon ki prabhavshilta aur suraksha ko sunishchit kiya ja raha hai
